name.description: The name of the managed cluster resource.
The name of the agent pool.

properties.description: Properties for the container service agent pool profile.

name.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

properties.description: Properties of a private endpoint connection.

maxSurge.description: Count or percentage of additional nodes to be added during upgrade. If empty uses AKS default

clientId.description: The client id of the user assigned identity.

objectId.description: The object id of the user assigned identity.

resourceId.description: The resource id of the user assigned identity.

adminUsername.description: The administrator username to use for Linux VMs.

ssh.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

ContainerServiceLinuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

dnsServiceIP.description: An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in serviceCidr.

dockerBridgeCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.

loadBalancerProfile.description: Profile of the managed cluster load balancer.

loadBalancerSku.description: The load balancer sku for the managed cluster.

networkMode.description: Network mode used for building Kubernetes network.

networkPlugin.description: Network plugin used for building Kubernetes network.

networkPolicy.description: Network policy used for building Kubernetes network.

podCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign pod IPs when kubenet is used.

serviceCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges.

publicKeys.description: The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs. Only expect one key specified.

ContainerServiceSshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

keyData.description: Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

ContainerServiceSshPublicKey.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key data.

allowedUnsafeSysctls.description: Allowlist of unsafe sysctls or unsafe sysctl patterns (ending in `*`).

cpuCfsQuota.description: Enable CPU CFS quota enforcement for containers that specify CPU limits.

cpuCfsQuotaPeriod.description: Sets CPU CFS quota period value.

failSwapOn.description: If set to true it will make the Kubelet fail to start if swap is enabled on the node.

imageGcHighThreshold.description: The percent of disk usage after which image garbage collection is always run.

imageGcLowThreshold.description: The percent of disk usage before which image garbage collection is never run.

swapFileSizeMB.description: SwapFileSizeMB specifies size in MB of a swap file will be created on each node.

sysctls.description: Sysctl settings for Linux agent nodes.

LinuxOSConfig.description: OS configurations of Linux agent nodes.

adminGroupObjectIDs.description: AAD group object IDs that will have admin role of the cluster.

enableAzureRBAC.description: Whether to enable Azure RBAC for Kubernetes authorization.

tenantID.description: The AAD tenant ID to use for authentication. If not specified, will use the tenant of the deployment subscription.

ManagedClusterAADProfile.description: AADProfile specifies attributes for Azure Active Directory integration.

config.description: Key-value pairs for configuring an add-on.

enabled.description: Whether the add-on is enabled or not.

ManagedClusterAddonProfile.description: A Kubernetes add-on profile for a managed cluster.

availabilityZones.description: Availability zones for nodes. Must use VirtualMachineScaleSets AgentPoolType.

count.description: Number of agents (VMs) to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 0 to 100 (inclusive) for user pools and in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive) for system pools. The default value is 1.

linuxOSConfig.description: OS configurations of Linux agent nodes.

maxCount.description: Maximum number of nodes for auto-scaling

maxPods.description: Maximum number of pods that can run on a node.

minCount.description: Minimum number of nodes for auto-scaling

mode.description: AgentPoolMode represents mode of an agent pool.

name.description: Unique name of the agent pool profile in the context of the subscription and resource group.

nodeLabels.description: Agent pool node labels to be persisted across all nodes in agent pool.

nodeTaints.description: Taints added to new nodes during node pool create and scale. For example, key=value:NoSchedule.

orchestratorVersion.description: Version of orchestrator specified when creating the managed cluster.

osDiskSizeGB.description: OS Disk Size in GB to be used to specify the disk size for every machine in this master/agent pool. If you specify 0, it will apply the default osDisk size according to the vmSize specified.

osDiskType.description: OS disk type to be used for machines in a given agent pool. Allowed values are 'Ephemeral' and 'Managed'. Defaults to 'Managed'. May not be changed after creation.

osType.description: OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux.

podSubnetID.description: specifies a subnet's resource id with subscription, resource group, vnet and subnet name

proximityPlacementGroupID.description: The ID for Proximity Placement Group.

scaleSetEvictionPolicy.description: ScaleSetEvictionPolicy to be used to specify eviction policy for Spot virtual machine scale set. Default to Delete.

scaleSetPriority.description: ScaleSetPriority to be used to specify virtual machine scale set priority. Default to regular.

spotMaxPrice.description: SpotMaxPrice to be used to specify the maximum price you are willing to pay in US Dollars. Possible values are any decimal value greater than zero or -1 which indicates default price to be up-to on-demand.

tags.description: Agent pool tags to be persisted on the agent pool virtual machine scale set.

type.description: AgentPoolType represents types of an agent pool.

vnetSubnetID.description: specifies a subnet's resource id with subscription, resource group, vnet and subnet name

ManagedClusterAgentPoolProfile.description: Profile for the container service agent pool.

availabilityZones.description: Availability zones for nodes. Must use VirtualMachineScaleSets AgentPoolType.

count.description: Number of agents (VMs) to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 0 to 100 (inclusive) for user pools and in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive) for system pools. The default value is 1.

linuxOSConfig.description: OS configurations of Linux agent nodes.

maxCount.description: Maximum number of nodes for auto-scaling

maxPods.description: Maximum number of pods that can run on a node.

minCount.description: Minimum number of nodes for auto-scaling

mode.description: AgentPoolMode represents mode of an agent pool.

nodeLabels.description: Agent pool node labels to be persisted across all nodes in agent pool.

nodeTaints.description: Taints added to new nodes during node pool create and scale. For example, key=value:NoSchedule.

orchestratorVersion.description: Version of orchestrator specified when creating the managed cluster.

osDiskSizeGB.description: OS Disk Size in GB to be used to specify the disk size for every machine in this master/agent pool. If you specify 0, it will apply the default osDisk size according to the vmSize specified.

osDiskType.description: OS disk type to be used for machines in a given agent pool. Allowed values are 'Ephemeral' and 'Managed'. Defaults to 'Managed'. May not be changed after creation.

osType.description: OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux.

podSubnetID.description: specifies a subnet's resource id with subscription, resource group, vnet and subnet name

proximityPlacementGroupID.description: The ID for Proximity Placement Group.

scaleSetEvictionPolicy.description: ScaleSetEvictionPolicy to be used to specify eviction policy for Spot virtual machine scale set. Default to Delete.

scaleSetPriority.description: ScaleSetPriority to be used to specify virtual machine scale set priority. Default to regular.

spotMaxPrice.description: SpotMaxPrice to be used to specify the maximum price you are willing to pay in US Dollars. Possible values are any decimal value greater than zero or -1 which indicates default price to be up-to on-demand.

tags.description: Agent pool tags to be persisted on the agent pool virtual machine scale set.

type.description: AgentPoolType represents types of an agent pool.

vnetSubnetID.description: specifies a subnet's resource id with subscription, resource group, vnet and subnet name

ManagedClusterAgentPoolProfileProperties.description: Properties for the container service agent pool profile.

authorizedIPRanges.description: Authorized IP Ranges to kubernetes API server.

enablePrivateCluster.description: Whether to create the cluster as a private cluster or not.

privateDNSZone.description: Private dns zone mode for private cluster.

ManagedClusterAPIServerAccessProfile.description: Access profile for managed cluster API server.

ManagedClusterAutoUpgradeProfile.description: Auto upgrade profile for a managed cluster.

type.description: The type of identity used for the managed cluster. Type 'SystemAssigned' will use an implicitly created identity in master components and an auto-created user assigned identity in MC_ resource group in agent nodes. Type 'None' will not use MSI for the managed cluster, service principal will be used instead.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The user identity associated with the managed cluster. This identity will be used in control plane and only one user assigned identity is allowed. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

allocatedOutboundPorts.description: Desired number of allocated SNAT ports per VM. Allowed values must be in the range of 0 to 64000 (inclusive). The default value is 0 which results in Azure dynamically allocating ports.

effectiveOutboundIPs.description: The effective outbound IP resources of the cluster load balancer.

idleTimeoutInMinutes.description: Desired outbound flow idle timeout in minutes. Allowed values must be in the range of 4 to 120 (inclusive). The default value is 30 minutes.

managedOutboundIPs.description: Desired managed outbound IPs for the cluster load balancer.

outboundIPPrefixes.description: Desired outbound IP Prefix resources for the cluster load balancer.

outboundIPs.description: Desired outbound IP resources for the cluster load balancer.

ManagedClusterLoadBalancerProfile.description: Profile of the managed cluster load balancer.

count.description: Desired number of outbound IP created/managed by Azure for the cluster load balancer. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

ManagedClusterLoadBalancerProfileManaged.description: Desired managed outbound IPs for the cluster load balancer.

publicIPPrefixes.description: A list of public IP prefix resources.

ManagedClusterLoadBalancerProfileOutboun.description: Desired outbound IP Prefix resources for the cluster load balancer.

publicIPs.description: A list of public IP resources.

ManagedClusterLoadBalancerProfileOutboun.description: Desired outbound IP resources for the cluster load balancer.

name.description: Name of the pod identity exception.

namespace.description: Namespace of the pod identity exception.

enabled.description: Whether the pod identity addon is enabled.

userAssignedIdentityExceptions.description: User assigned pod identity exception settings.

aadProfile.description: AADProfile specifies attributes for Azure Active Directory integration.

apiServerAccessProfile.description: Access profile for managed cluster API server.

autoScalerProfile.description: Parameters to be applied to the cluster-autoscaler when enabled

autoUpgradeProfile.description: Auto upgrade profile for a managed cluster.

diskEncryptionSetID.description: ResourceId of the disk encryption set to use for enabling encryption at rest.

dnsPrefix.description: DNS prefix specified when creating the managed cluster.

enablePodSecurityPolicy.description: (DEPRECATING) Whether to enable Kubernetes pod security policy (preview). This feature is set for removal on October 15th, 2020. Learn more at aka.ms/aks/azpodpolicy.

enableRBAC.description: Whether to enable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control.

kubernetesVersion.description: Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

linuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

nodeResourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group containing agent pool nodes.

servicePrincipalProfile.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

windowsProfile.description: Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

ManagedClusterPropertiesAutoScalerProfil.description: Parameters to be applied to the cluster-autoscaler when enabled

clientId.description: The ID for the service principal.

secret.description: The secret password associated with the service principal in plain text.

ManagedClusterServicePrincipalProfile.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

name.description: Name of a managed cluster SKU.

tier.description: Tier of a managed cluster SKU.

name.description: The name of the agent pool.

properties.description: Properties for the container service agent pool profile.

name.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

properties.description: Properties of a private endpoint connection.

adminPassword.description:
Specifies the password of the administrator account.

**Minimum-length:** 8 characters

**Max-length:** 123 characters

**Complexity requirements:** 3 out of 4 conditions below need to be fulfilled
Has lower characters
Has upper characters
Has a digit
Has a special character (Regex match [\W_])

**Disallowed values:** "abc@123", "P@$$w0rd", "P@ssw0rd", "P@ssword123", "Pa$$word", "pass@word1", "Password!", "Password1", "Password22", "iloveyou!"

adminUsername.description:
Specifies the name of the administrator account.

**restriction:** Cannot end in "."

**Disallowed values:** "administrator", "admin", "user", "user1", "test", "user2", "test1", "user3", "admin1", "1", "123", "a", "actuser", "adm", "admin2", "aspnet", "backup", "console", "david", "guest", "john", "owner", "root", "server", "sql", "support", "support_388945a0", "sys", "test2", "test3", "user4", "user5".

**Minimum-length:** 1 character

**Max-length:** 20 characters

licenseType.description: The licenseType to use for Windows VMs. Windows_Server is used to enable Azure Hybrid User Benefits for Windows VMs.

ManagedClusterWindowsProfile.description: Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

id.description: The resource Id for private endpoint

PrivateEndpoint.description: Private endpoint which a connection belongs to.

privateEndpoint.description: Private endpoint which a connection belongs to.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The state of a private link service connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of a private endpoint connection.

description.description: The private link service connection description.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The state of a private link service connection.

id.description: The fully qualified Azure resource id.

ResourceReference.description: A reference to an Azure resource.

SysctlConfig.description: Sysctl settings for Linux agent nodes.

clientId.description: The client id of the user assigned identity.

objectId.description: The object id of the user assigned identity.

resourceId.description: The resource id of the user assigned identity.
